curam.util.ctm.bom

Class BusinessObjectHelperUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • curam.util.ctm.bom.BusinessObjectHelperUtils

  • public final class BusinessObjectHelperUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class written for BusinessObjectHelper which contains the commonly used methods such as XML parsing from business object's document object, populating data related to shared data map, methods that assists the usage of reflective APIs etc.

    • Method Detail

      • parseBusinessObjectIdentifier

        public static BusinessObjectIdentifier parseBusinessObjectIdentifier(org.w3c.dom.Document businessObjectDocument)
        Given a business object document, this method parses to find out the type and the key and then suitably constructs and returns the business object identifier object.
        Parameters:
        businessObjectDocument - The business object document that requires parsing.
        Returns:
        The newly constructed business object identifier from the business object document.

      • isMethodExists

        public static java.lang.reflect.Method isMethodExists(java.lang.Class<?> anyClassObject,
                                                      java.lang.String methodName,
                                                      java.lang.Class<?>[] methodParameters)
                                               throws AppException,
                                                      InformationalException
        This utility method is used to find the existence of a method in a given class.
        Parameters:
        anyClassObject - The class object on which the existence of a particular method has to be checked.
        methodName - The name of the method that needs to be checked for its existence.
        methodParameters - The parameters that the method accepts.
        Returns:
        Returns the method object if the given method name is present in the class, else returns NULL.
        Throws:
        AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

      • convertDocumentToDtlsMultiMap

        public static MultiValuedMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> convertDocumentToDtlsMultiMap(org.w3c.dom.Document boDocument)
                                                                                       throws AppException,
                                                                                              InformationalException
        Given the document object representing the business object XML content, this method will iterate over the entire document to find out the set of entities , then dynamically constructs details object for the respective entities.
        Parameters:
        boDocument - The XML document representing the business object content.
        Returns:
        The multiple valued map MultiValuedMap containing the set of detail objects keyed in with the name of the entity class.
        Throws:
        AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

                                                                                                          throws AppException,
                                                                                                                 InformationalException
        Given the document object representing the business object XML content, this method will iterate over the entire document to find out the set of entities, then dynamically constructs details object for the respective entities.
        Parameters:
        boDocument - The XML document representing the business object content.
        Returns:
        The map containing the set of detail objects keyed in with the name of the entity class.
        Throws:
        AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

      • getFieldValueAsObject

        public static java.lang.Object getFieldValueAsObject(java.lang.Object object,
                                                     java.lang.String fieldName)
                                              throws InformationalException,
                                                     AppException
        Reflectively queries for the field value for the given field name on the object.
        Parameters:
        object - The object on which the value of the field has to be queried for.
        fieldName - The name of the field.
        Returns:
        The value for the field as identified through the field name.
        Throws:
        AppException - Because of the usage of reflection, any method throwing an exception because of reflection, the exception and will be wrapped and be will be re-thrown an AppException.
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.
